channel.title: Soon to be Official Rsportal Pserver | Need modelers!
channel.description:
Hey guys well I am developing a new Private server! It will soon be verified by admins to be official!
We are going to change the name but here is a picture of the load up screen. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2881jjm.png[/img]
We will be hosting this off a dedicated server with over 8GB RAM! that can hold over 200+ users!
Updates:
-I am creating models to make new items! -We are planning to make this not just a runescape private server but it will have alot of events and NPC's! -We are creating actual POKEMON NPC into the game!(we are debating if it should be monsters you can attack, right now its just like a person that you talk to, also we are trying to make a outfit so you can look just like one! [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/9rn193.png[/img] -If you know how to model you can join us make new items -Currently making a full outfit for server admins (it will show a shirt saying your admin etc.) -Making some kind of shield with rsportal logo [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/59t20.png[/img] -added rsportal cape (this is not the official cape) ONLY for server admins [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/4lrh53.png[/img]
We have things set but right now we need more money to buy hosting etc.
Please donate if you can!
If you can donate please donate by clicking the donate button [URL=http://"https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=A94E5VAV59KZU"][IMG]https://www.paypal.com/en_US/i/btn/btn_donate_LG.gif[/img][/URL] Tottal Donations Goal: [COLOR="Lime"]0/50 USD[/COLOR]
We have things set but right now we need more money to buy hosting etc.

item.description:
@gids wrote:

Hey guys well I am developing a new Private server!
It will soon be verified by admins to be official!

We are going to change the name but here is a picture of the load up screen.

2881jjm.png751×560

We will be hosting this off a dedicated server with over 8GB RAM! that can hold over 200+ users!

Updates:

-I am creating models to make new items!
-We are planning to make this not just a runescape private server but it will have alot of events and NPC’s!
-We are creating actual POKEMON NPC into the game!(we are debating if it should be monsters you can attack, right now its just like a person that you talk to, also we are trying to make a outfit so you can look just like one!

-If you know how to model you can join us make new items
-Currently making a full outfit for server admins (it will show a shirt saying your admin etc.)
-Making some kind of shield with rsportal logo

59t20.png1352×757

-added rsportal cape (this is not the official cape) ONLY for server admins
4lrh53.png908×668

We have things set but right now we need more money to buy hosting etc.

Please donate if you can!

If you can donate please donate by clicking the donate button

Tottal Donations Goal: [COLOR=“Lime”]0/50 USD[/COLOR]
